document_data.name: Kass
document_data.turnednotes: transformed into a vampire spawn by [[Cazador Szarr]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Kass''' was a [[vampire spawn]] [[Gur]] child from the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Kass was a [[human]] girl with hair streaked with white.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, [[Ulma]] led her monster hunter tribe to the city of Baldur's Gate, where they found themselves targeted by [[vampire]]s. During the [[Absolute crisis]], when the Gurs camped in the [[Rivington]] district of the city, along with a small army of refugees displaced by the conflict, the tribe's children were abducted by [[Astarion Ancunín]] under orders from [[Cazador Szarr]].

Posters with [[charcoal]] drawings of Kass' face were found in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]], promising a reward for any information on the child's fate. Kass, along with other abducted Gur children, was turned into a vampire spawn to be used in a hellish ritual by Cazador. Subsequently, Astarion Ancunín found himself broken out from under Cazador's control and, along with the [[Absolute Adversaries]], sought to infiltrate his old master's home. The outcome of Astarion's infiltration and the fate of the Gur children remained unconfirmed.
